title: Declaring a National Energy Emergency
author: The White House
intro: Presidential action declaring a national energy emergency to address critical infrastructure and energy security needs.

title: White House Unveils America's AI Action Plan
author: The White House
intro: Comprehensive strategy for advancing artificial intelligence while ensuring safety, security, and American leadership in AI innovation.

title: AI Data Centers Desperate for Electricity Are Building Their Own Power Plants
author: WSJ Staff
intro: Tech companies are constructing dedicated power facilities as data center energy demands surge, reshaping the energy landscape.

title: AI to Drive 165% Increase in Data Center Power Demand by 2030
author: Goldman Sachs Research
intro: New research projects unprecedented growth in power consumption driven by artificial intelligence infrastructure and computing needs.
